articles.author: Sarah Fortinsky
articles.title: India confirms first HMPV cases amid surge in China - The Hill
articles.description: India confirmed its first cases of human metapneumovirus (HMPV) infections in children, with a total of seven cases reported as of Tuesday. The cases were reported in Bengaluru, Nagpur, Tamil Nadu and Ahmedabad, according to The Economic Times. And the cases …
